item.title: The Formidable Obstacles to a Cease-Fire in Ukraine
item.description: It may seem like a deal is ready to be made. But making it stick is another matter.

item.title: Tariff Mania
item.description: ‘Tariff’ is not a beautiful word for the state of our economy or our strategic relationships.

item.title: Donald Trump Pulls Up Hard on Elon Musk
item.description: The president has made it clear: Musk has gone too far, created too many unnecessary messes, and comported himself too clumsily.

item.title: Judge Ali Is a Threat to Democracy
item.description: When judges are unmoored by the Constitution or statute, they become unelected political actors who themselves are a threat to our system of governmen...

item.title: Oregon Lies About Transgender Treatments for Kids
item.description: The state is endangering minors despite no sound evidence showing the benefits of transgender treatments — and mounting evidence showing the harm.
